title: REPOST IF PIGEON -- IGNORE IF NOT

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Post the REPOST IF PIGEON -- IGNORE IF NOT gif in the day channel.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After you post the GIF, if anyone else posts the GIF in a game channel, their role name will be changed to Pigeon. This doesn't affect their abilities, attributes, goal, or anything else. But people will appear as a Pigeon whenever their role is mentioned. You're a Serial Killer? The person you killed last night was stabbed by a **Pigeon**. Deluxe ended up dying, but his role was **Pigeon** (1724).
https://tenor.com/view/bird-gif-25351357

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See to it that everyone ALIVE is a Pigeon.
